name: CreateEnvironmentSubscription
description:
Create a new subscription for an environment.

This tool is used to create a new subscription for a specific environment in a project. It is useful when you need to set up notification or monitoring preferences for the environment within the Datadog service.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to access the specific project. Use /api/projects/ to find this ID.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: environment_subscription_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the subscription. Includes fields like id, dashboard, insight, target_type (email, slack, webhook), target_value, frequency (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly), interval, and more to configure the subscription setup.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
